ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 179
ygData.msgSnippet: Frankly, imo, a SK is the BEST tank in the game hands down, and this is also a best kept secret.  The ability to snare with darkness, FD pull, and tank with
ygData.messageBody:
Frankly, imo, a SK is the BEST tank in the game hands down, and this is also
a best kept secret. The ability to snare with darkness, FD pull, and tank
with the best of them make it a awesome class. Also nice to have
invisibility to undead and self invis to move around. Great hybrid. I would
ask you to consider your choice of race again. Another awesome aspect is we
are the only class that can choose the ogre race, which gives great stats,
and the ability to Slam. You could still group with your "goodie" friends,
how often do you really need to enter a good city?

----- Original Message -----
From: "Matthew Studer" <matthew_studer@...>
To: <shadowknight@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 11:20 AM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 179


> Hi I am a Lvl 4 Human Shadowknight who worships Innorukk .. .
>
> My friend is an Agnostic Human Mage and he is not KOS from Dark Elf
guards.
> . .
>
> I should be at least apprehensive since he is dubious was my thinking, but
I
> just wanted to know what any other human shadowknights experiences were. .
.
>
>
> I picked Human for 1 main reason, all my friends who I am playing my low
lvl
> Shadowkngiht with are good and I thought Human would be the most welcome
in
> other good cities . . .
>
> How do you guys like playing a Shadowknight???
>
> I have a L42 Ogre Shaman also and a L26 Necro Gnome . . .
>
> :-)
>
> Naztek the SK
> E'ci
>
